text: Marktl (unofficial name: Marktl am Inn, lit. "Little market on the river Inn") is a village and historic market municipality. It is in Altötting, a district (Landkreis) in Upper Bavaria. It is the birthplace of Pope Benedict XVI. == Twin towns — sister cities == Marktl is twinned with: * Wadowice, Poland (2006) * Gönnheim, Germany * Sotto il Monte Giovanni XXIII, Italy (2009) ==References== == Other websites == * markt-marktl.de Official Homepage * Marktl am Inn Sleepy Bavarian Village on the World Map. Category:Altötting (district) Category:Municipalities in Bavaria
title: Marktl
